overview.body: A temporary exhibition design for an emerging artist's debut solo show. The brief: create a space that enhances the artwork without competing with it — guiding visitors through a narrative experience.
overview.bodyCn: 一位新兴艺术家首次个展的临时展览设计。设计要求：创造一个增强艺术品效果而不与之竞争的空间——引导观众经历叙事体验。

testimonial.quote: The space Julia designed didn't just display the art — it elevated it. Visitors told me they felt they were inside the paintings.
testimonial.quoteCn: Julia设计的空间不仅仅展示了艺术——它提升了艺术。参观者告诉我，他们感觉自己置身于画中。
testimonial.author: Elena Vasquez, Artist

seo.title: SoHo Art Gallery Installation — Julia Studio
seo.description: Exhibition design for emerging artist's debut solo show in SoHo, New York. Contemporary space design enhancing the artwork narrative.
